name: Orum's Death Run
description:
Orum's Death Run is developing with you. Your feedback is always welcome.

Orum's Death Run is a multiplayer TPS game, often with silly and funny scenes. This game has existed as a mini game of several games. The background is a jump map made of containers, grass and concrete.





Up to 20 players can play and at least 2 players can play. Psychological warfare between attackers and defenders take place. Attackers start with 60 bullets. And defenders start without a bullet. so defenders must kill as many attackers as possible before they reach defenders' side.

Quick Play
Play the game randomly with the players. This is standard game mode of Orum's Death Run. You will play a game to standard rules with four other players

Custom Play
Play with your friends in your own rules. Orum's Death Run doesn't have a group system. So if you want to play with your friend, select this game mode. You can customize the game's rules by yourself.

This game was previously in the Mini game of other games. This game has made the Mini game into a game. Orum's Death Run will be a new genre game never seen before.





Enjoy Orum's Death Run being developed at Orum Games.

When you have an idea or feedback for this game, Please send to my email.
